history.content:
Piazza/email etiquette: Please only pick 1 forum to ask a question. (ie please don't simultaneously post the same question to both piazza and email as it doubles the effort/time from multiple staff members.) Piazza is generally faster because we do have multiple staff monitoring it. Also, piazza answers the question for everyone and we may get dozens of emails asking the same question. In short, use Piazza and facebook when ever possible because it helps your peers and helps us answer faster!

Thank you!
history.subject: use Piazza > email for general advising questions
